description:
Waterproof gloves that offer comfort and performance in winter riding conditions. Grippy pads provide control, and carefully placed padding reduces fatigue on bumpy rides. Large reflective logos add a margin of safety in low-light conditions.

  • Waterproof-breathable construction with fully sealed seams
  • Grippy silicone pads on fingers
  • Strategically placed thumb padding
  • Microfibre patch on back of thumb for wiping glasses
  • Reflective logos on cuff and back of hand
  • As of 2020 Showers Pass is Climate Neutral certified, meaning they fully offset their carbon emissions. Climate Neutral certified is a consumer label that's carried by brands who take responsibility for greenhouse gas emissions generated in production, operation and shipping of their goods and services
name: Showers Pass Crosspoint Soft Shell Waterproof Gloves - Men's
